channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Linthorpe Road N16 Hackney dumped items, 5th October
item.description:
Dumped items left for weeks on Linthorpe road N16 from top to bottom, Hackney council needs to clear.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Linthorpe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Graffiti on side of bin at bus stop Q on Orchard Road

item.title: Homeless man sleeping for months, 5th October
item.description:
An older man had been sleeping outside of whole foods for months, there is now another person too. The area is becoming cluttered with waste and bedding. There is also another person sleeping in the bushes at the back of a building in the car park.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilmer Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Amherst Road N16 Hackney, 5th October
item.description:
Overflowing bins with food on floor area, causing mice,rats & foxes to eat and foul, needs to be cleaned

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stamford Hill, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is off, 5th October
item.description:
This light is Victorian and is in a conservation area.The lamp post is at the end of the road where it is particularly dark. During the past year the light has been on permanently but has now stopped working completely.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 x STOP SIGNS STOLEN, 5th October
item.description:
Both STOP signs were stolen by 2 men in the night. This is a dangerous junction

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cambridge Avenue, Falconwood, London

item.title: Homeless man sleeping and leaving belonging and litter behind, 5th October
item.description:
One homeless man has been sleeping here for months with no resolution and now a second person is sleeping there too leaving a lot of food and personal belongings behind

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Forest bikes on disabled and motorbike only parking spaces, 5th October
item.description:
A forest bike has been left in the disabled parking space outside 83 Leander Road. Two forest bikes are parked in the space reserved for motorbikes outside 76 Leander Road. These spaces are clearly marked as can be seen on photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leander Road, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish strewn all over the street, 5th October

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49-56, Morshead Road, Kensal Town, London

item.title: Abandoned vehicle parked in a residentsâ€™ public parking area. Vehicle is being used by persons to eat and sleep in, use drugs., 5th October
item.description:
Vehicle has SORN status and is uninsured. It is insecure, has flat tyres, a flat battery, no key. It is being used by persons:members of public to live and sleep in. It is also being used by these persons for controlled drug use.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southport Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Bins left on pavement for several weeks, 5th October
item.description:
All household bins from number 34 have been left on pavement for several weeks. Restricting pavement access. The property has a large driveway where bins should be kept unless its bin collection day. Instead bins are being permanently left by resident of 34 on pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Northumberland Heath, London
